long_description:
the concept of dillon's restaurant began in 1998 when co-owner george valverde approached rich dillon with a partnership designed to bring valverde's vision to reality. since that time, the vision has blossomed into a successful restaurant with 5 locations and a catering business. our newest location, dillon's k.c. style barbeque, just opened november 11, 2011 at the wildlife world zoo. press release for dillon's new location @ wildlife world zoo & aquarium
now you can dine with the sharks @ dillon's. a beautiful 60,000 gallon shark tank, along with a vibrant flamingo exhibit, on our patio, is yours to behold at our newest location. nestled in the shade of the white tank mountains, dillon's k.c. style barbeque is the host restaurant at the extraordinary wildlife world zoo & aquarium. whether dining with friends, family, or planning a special corporate event, dillon's at the wildlife world zoo & acquarium offers an experience that is unlike any other in the state of arizona. our diverse menu is pleasing to any palate that's craving our classic kansas city style barbeque, as well as salads, appetizers, desserts, and more. dillon's partners with the wildlife world zoo & aquarium for lunch, dinner, weddings, anniversary parties, children's parties, corporate outings serving 10 to 1,500, and catering.
